hpvscrape 0.7
  • Reference

R6 Object to open and scrape PDF Files

Source: R/pdftools.R
PDFTool.Rd

Scrape text from PDF file, and manage that file

Methods

Public methods

  • PDFTool$new()

  • PDFTool$getResults()

  • PDFTool$getPDFs()

  • PDFTool$clone()

Method new()

Open pdf file for parsing

Usage

PDFTool$new(pdf, start, end)

Arguments

pdf

a path to pdf or base::raw vector containing the pdf of test results

start

the string deliminating the start of a result

end

the string deliminating the end of a result

Returns

A new PDFTool object

Method getResults()

Vector of results (combined)

Usage

PDFTool$getResults()

Returns

vector of combined results

Method getPDFs()

get specific pdf for a result

Usage

PDFTool$getPDFs(resNum, output)

Arguments

resNum

integer of the result (index of getResult())

output

path to where pdf will be written

Returns

path to pdf

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

PDFTool$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
